LearningSession - Class in de.aicard.learnset
Provides a ArrayList of CardStatus, so that the Account can Learn the Cards.
LearningSession(ArrayList<CardStatus>) - Constructor for class de.aicard.learnset.LearningSession
Constructor of LearningSession sets currentCard to 0 and isActive to true.
LearningSessionTest - Class in de.aicard.learnset
This class tests the functions of the class LearningSessionTests

learnSet - Variable in class de.aicard.learnset.LearnSetAbo
The LearnSet the Account subscribed to.
LearnSet - Class in de.aicard.learnset
Provides CardList with additional information: Title, Description, Faculty(to which Accounts from which Faculties it will be shown) CommentList, Evaluations(only 1 per Account->LearnSetAbo is possible) Owner(Account who created the LearnSet), Admins(Accounts who can edit the LearnSet) Visibility(to show the LearnSet to all Account, to Faculty and Friends or only to Owner)
LearnSet(CardList) - Constructor for class de.aicard.learnset.LearnSet
 
LearnSet(String, Faculty, CardList, Account) - Constructor for class de.aicard.learnset.LearnSet
 
LearnSet(String, String, Faculty) - Constructor for class de.aicard.learnset.LearnSet
 
LearnSet(String, String, Faculty, CardList, Account, Visibility) - Constructor for class de.aicard.learnset.LearnSet
 
LearnSetAbo - Class in de.aicard.learnset
Provides a LearnSet with further, account-specific information and is thus always embedded into an account.
LearnSetAbo(LearnSet) - Constructor for class de.aicard.learnset.LearnSetAbo
Constructor of the LearnSetAbo
